tool_description:
Reply-Gen: AI-Powered Replies
Generate human-quality replies to any content, effortlessly. Specify reply length, reading level, and emotions for perfect control. Boost productivity, save time, and spark deeper audience engagement. Try Reply-Gen today!
name: ReplyGen
title: ReplyGen

api_list.name: valid_rapid_api_request_valid_rapid_api_request_get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://replygen.p.rapidapi.com/valid_rapid_api_request"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "replygen.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
